terrains.name: water
terrains.description: Slows movement significantly unless you have a boat or specialized unit.

terrains.name: beach
terrains.description: Easy to traverse, allowing quick movement along the shoreline with no obstacles.

terrains.name: grass
terrains.description: Flat terrain that enables fast and efficient movement across open fields.

terrains.name: forest
terrains.description: Dense trees slow down movement, but provide good cover and concealment.

terrains.name: mountain
terrains.description: Difficult terrain to traverse, but offers strategic high ground and defensive benefits.
